comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model QueueType adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/QueueType/schema.json
description: Property. Information about the type of a Passenger Queue. Values can be: Pre-Check, Private, Economy, Priority, KnownCrewMember.

contents.name: Code
contents.comment: Unique code for the type of Passenger Queue.

contents.name: Description
contents.comment: Description of the type of Passenger Queue.
